snippet.title: Arena Breakout - Official Season 4 Bruce Lee Teaser Trailer
snippet.description: Arena Breakout is a mobile tactical first-person shooter developed by Morefun Studios. With the arrival of Season 4, a new addition to the game in the form of an iconic martial artist joins the battlefield. Bruce Lee has delivered a message to the combatants of Kamona via signed postcards scattered throughout the region. Collect them all and escape the Dark Zone alive to claim the glory, or die and risk letting them fall into enemy hands. Season 4 of Arena Breakout is available now for iOS and Android.
